messages.text: Regarding the cruelty that came up earlier in the conversation, most of my childhood I grew up in Ramla, and if there was something I was always exposed to, it's the lack of mercy among Muslims
It could be dog fights where you could see the enjoyment in their eyes
It could be Mohammed putting on a show for the neighborhood kids by decapitating pigeons or sticking firecrackers in them in various places, lighting and releasing them. Experiences of age 7.
A childhood memory that hasn't left me to this day
